item.title: SIEM. Why scoping environment is important.
item.description:
SIEM stands for Security Information and Event Management. Log management and notifications is a part of PCI DSS requirements and not optional in case of SAQ D.

Activity on your network should be logged and sent to SIEM for analysis. Such activity includes user activity on workstations and servers, also various system events on your network - servers, firewalls, switches. Logs from your network can be used in event of breach to rebuild a picture what was happening. These logs can be sent to SIEM system for analysis and alerting.
